content.en: miR-29b in Breast Cancer: Scientists have used computational methods and microarray analysis to identify the mRNAs targeted by miR-29b in breast cancer cells. They have also employed data-driven approaches and miRNA expression profiling to understand the role of miRNAs in breast cancer subtypes and their interactions with cellular pathways. Additionally, algorithms such as target prediction algorithms and data enrichment analysis have been used to identify differentially expressed miRNA signatures in HER2(+) versus HER2(-) breast cancers.
content.da: miR-29b i brystkræft: Forskere har anvendt computerbaserede metoder og mikroarrayanalyse til at identificere de mRNA'er, der er målrettet af miR-29b i brystkræftceller. De har også brugt datadrevne tilgange og miRNA-udtryksprofilering for at forstå miRNA'ernes rolle i brystkræftsubtyper og deres interaktioner med cellulære pathways. Desuden er algoritmer som målprediktionsalgoritmer og dataanrikningsanalyse blevet brugt til at identificere differentielt udtrykte miRNA-signaturer i HER2(+) versus HER2(-) brystkræft.
